name: Zycus
tag_list: procurement, procurement-solutions, procurement-software, esourcing-solutions, esourcing, supplier-management, contract-management, spend-management, spend-analysis
overview: Zycus has evolved its portfolio to a full suite of Procurement Performance Solutions and continues to deliver spend management solutions that are world renowned for delivering an accelerated return on investment through superior user adoption creating maximized savings. Zycusâ€™ procurement solution suite is built from the ground up combining cutting-edge technology and domain expertise, enabling higher performance and sustainable value to organizations worldwide. Zycus provides procurement solutions globally to more than 150 leading Fortune 1000 customers that consider procurement management software, processes and technology strategic to their competitive advantage. Zycus’ procurement solutions automate and streamline the processes of Spend Analysis, eSourcing, Contract Management, Supplier Management, Financial Savings Management, and Procure-to-Pay. Login to www.zycus.com for more details.

milestones.description: Prior to Zycus, Aatish enjoyed a flourishing career at Intel Corporation in the United States and was part of the core design team on the Pentium-II processor. At Intel, Aatish also introduced Internet and Intranet technologies within the Pentium-II group

Company founded by Aatish Dedhia under the name of EzeeNet Infotech and was focused on Content aggregation and repurposing for Job boards and portals Like Monster and Yahoo. During this period, Zycus was no.1 in the US.

Zycus received funding from CitiBank Private Equity and GE Capital. AutoClass was conceived and created using the Artificiial Intelligence and content classification experience from the previous business. GE signed up as a first customer for AutoClass.

Zycus creates and launches a new category: “Spend Data Management”, signing up early adopters such as, 3M, Dupont etc. Quickly scaling up to 25 Customers, Zycus received significant recognition as an industry domain leader and market leader. The SDM solut

Zycus grows at a rapid pace and gets initial deals in Europe and APAC. Zycus expands from Spend Data Management to Spend Analysis, extending the solution capability from spend data classification and enrichment to include reporting and analytics. New laun

Zycus targets higher growth through expansion of product mix and increased geographical coverage. Develops a unique and easy to use solution iSource after acquiring and improving a competing product. iSource allows users to create RFX within minutes, do e

In their report released in 2008, “Market Overview 2008: Automated Spend Analysis”, Forrester lists Zycus as one of three vendors which have collectively garnered 64% of market share in 2007. Aiming to launch a complete best-of-breed Spend Management Suit

Zycus continues to roll out high quality, advanced-technology solutions with the launch of its Supplier Performance Management (SPM) & Supplier Information Management (SIM) modules. The robust and highly configurable Zycus' SIM Solution is capable for map

Rebrands from spend management to procurement performance solutions. Adds the Financial Savings Management solution to the suite and enhances existing solutions with products like iCost, iOptimize & iManage.
